body_html: @elbamos cool, it seems that pytorch team prefer a separated implementation. I'll update my fork later for the other parts later. But I really do not have time on this and I guess we should start working on it when there is a plan from the pytorch team because this would be a big extension for pytorch.

body: @elbamos cool, it seems that pytorch team prefer a separated implementation. I'll update my fork later for the other parts later. But I really do not have time on this and I guess we should start working on it when there is a plan from the pytorch team because this would be a big extension for pytorch.
